lead_paragraph: WALKER--Robert Stringfellow IV "Bob." 74, of Northport, MI died peacefully surrounded by family and without pain on January 13, 2016. Bob lived in Darien and Wilton and worked in Manhattan and Westchester for IBM. Condolences may be shared with the Walker family at: www.martinson.info. 1/3
